form.name: ear_problems_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Ear Problems> Ear Problems Two

field.name: Does the child have any of the following signs?
Mastoiditis
field.options: Tender swelling behind the ear | Click here to take action

field.name: Acute ear infection
field.options: Pus seen draining from the ear and discharge reported for < 14 days | Ear pain | Click here to take action

field.name: Chronic ear infection
field.options: Pus seen draining from the ear and discharge reported for ≥ 14 days | Click here to take action

field.name: No ear infection
field.options: No ear pain AND | No pus seen draining from the ear | Click here to take action
